title: 谁能帮忙看下我的minecraft1.5.1崩溃的原因
author: mcfans2001
txt_content:
我装了食物矿石MOD，每次挖一会就崩溃，不知道是Mod的问题还是其他原因。
这是提示信息：

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop

A full error report has been saved to E:\mc\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-09_16.03.51-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
